headline.main: Oregon Lawmakers Getting Closer on Shaping New Pot Industry
headline.print_headline: Oregon Lawmakers Getting Closer on Shaping New Pot Industry

docs.snippet: In less than a month, Oregonians over age 21 will be able to legally grow, own and consume their own small amounts of recreational marijuana....
docs.lead_paragraph: In less than a month, Oregonians over age 21 will be able to legally grow, own and consume their own small amounts of recreational marijuana.

headline.main: Putnam Earns a Trip Home to Chambers Bay for US Open
headline.print_headline: Putnam Earns a Trip Home to Chambers Bay for US Open

docs.snippet: One day made up for five straight weeks of lousy golf for Michael Putnam. He's going home to Chambers Bay for the U.S. Open....
docs.lead_paragraph: One day made up for five straight weeks of lousy golf for Michael Putnam. He's going home to Chambers Bay for the U.S. Open.

headline.main: U.S.-Turkey Dispute on Syria to Persist After Erdogan Setback
headline.print_headline: U.S.-Turkey Dispute on Syria to Persist After Erdogan Setback

docs.snippet: Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan’s loss of his parliamentary majority is unlikely to end disagreements between Washington and Ankara, particularly over the conflict in Turkey's southern neighbor Syria, U.S. officials said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan’s loss of his parliamentary majority is unlikely to end disagreements between Washington and Ankara, particularly over the conflict in Turkey's southern neighbor Syria, U.S. officials said on Monday.

headline.main: Apple to Offer Apple Pay in UK in July, Backed by Banks, Retailers
headline.print_headline: Apple to Offer Apple Pay in UK in July, Backed by Banks, Retailers

docs.snippet: Apple Inc plans to introduce its mobile payments service to the UK next month, supported by major banks and high-street retailers and the operator of the London Underground, the technology company said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Apple Inc plans to introduce its mobile payments service to the UK next month, supported by major banks and high-street retailers and the operator of the London Underground, the technology company said on Monday.

headline.main: New AMA Policy Favors Ending Nonmedical Vaccine Exemptions
headline.print_headline: New AMA Policy Favors Ending Nonmedical Vaccine Exemptions

docs.lead_paragraph: The American Medical Association has adopted policies against nonmedical vaccine refusals and for transgender people in the military.

headline.main: G7 leaders bid 'Auf Wiedersehen' to carbon fuels
headline.sub: G7 leaders bid 'Auf Wiedersehen' to carbon fuels

docs.snippet: Group of Seven leaders agree to wean their energy-hungry economies off carbon fuels, marking a major step in the battle against global warming. Vanessa Johnston reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Group of Seven leaders agree to wean their energy-hungry economies off carbon fuels, marking a major step in the battle against global warming. Vanessa Johnston reports.

headline.main: Mississippi Blogger Pleads Guilty in U.S. Senator's Wife Photo Case
headline.print_headline: Mississippi Blogger Pleads Guilty in U.S. Senator's Wife Photo Case

docs.snippet: A Mississippi political blogger accused of breaking into a nursing home to videotape the ailing wife of U.S. Senator Thad Cochran pleaded guilty on Monday to conspiracy to commit burglary, according to a local district attorney....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Mississippi political blogger accused of breaking into a nursing home to videotape the ailing wife of U.S. Senator Thad Cochran pleaded guilty on Monday to conspiracy to commit burglary, according to a local district attorney.

docs.snippet: Sometimes even a nation's leader can't get a word in edgewise....

headline.main: Turkish Opposition Leader Says Islamic State Behind Bombings of Kurds
headline.print_headline: Turkish Opposition Leader Says Islamic State Behind Bombings of Kurds

docs.snippet: A string of bombings targeting Turkey's pro-Kurdish party during its campaign to enter parliament has been linked with Islamic State in Syria, the party's chairman said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A string of bombings targeting Turkey's pro-Kurdish party during its campaign to enter parliament has been linked with Islamic State in Syria, the party's chairman said on Monday.

headline.main: Exclusive: Henkel, Coty Submit Binding Bids for P&G Assets: Sources
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Henkel, Coty Submit Binding Bids for P&G Assets: Sources

docs.snippet: Henkel & Co KGaA AG and Coty Inc, both of which have personal care and cosmetics businesses, made binding offers to buy separate parts of Procter & Gamble Co's beauty businesses worth up to a total of $12 billion, according to people famil...
docs.lead_paragraph: Henkel & Co KGaA AG and Coty Inc, both of which have personal care and cosmetics businesses, made binding offers to buy separate parts of Procter & Gamble Co's beauty businesses worth up to a total of $12 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.
